definitions.body: Hittite woman, a wife of Esau Ge 26:34 (P); called daughter of Ishmael, and sister of Nebaioth Ge 36:3 (but due prob. to R; this daughter of Ishmael is [[מַחֲלַת]] in Ge 28:9 P); v. also Ge 36:4, Ge 36:10, Ge 36:13, Ge 36:17 (all P) (Sam. has [[מחלת]] throughout Ge 36).
daughter of Solomon, wife of Ahimaaz 1Ki 4:15.
